cause.description:
Support extensive cancer research done by staff at the Dana Farber Cancer Institute in Brookline, MA. The "Jimmy Fund" is a well-known organization in the New England area, focused on raising funds to continue the fight against deadly cancers.
Let's support the Fund and let's find a cure for cancer! Thousands of innoncent people are counting on research to create medicines that will end this war. Let's put and end to it faster! Support the Jimmy Fund today!
1. Support cancer research.
2. Give hope to those afflicted with the disease.
3. Support the Jimmy Fund
cause.mission: Support Cancer Research at the Dana Farber Cancer Institute in Brookline, MA.
cause.name: Support the Jimmy Fund
